code: import{configureStore,createStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import blogReducer from'../features/post/blogSlice';import userReducer from'../features/user/userSlice';import accountReducer from'../features/account/accountSlice';import topicReducer from'../features/topic/topicSlice';import bloggerReducer from'../features/user/bloggerSlice';import commentSlice from'../features/comment/commentSlice';var initialState={};export default configureStore({reducer:{blog:blogReducer,user:userReducer,account:accountReducer,topic:topicReducer,blogger:bloggerReducer,comment:commentSlice},preloadedState:initialState});
